text:
Answer concisely (1–2 sentences):
What's a fact that rich people won't admit but everyone knows is true?

Verse 1:
The rich are different
They don't care about the poor
They're always in their mansions
And they never have to work

Chorus:
The rich are different
They don't care about the poor
They're always in their mansions
And they never have to work

Verse 2:
They have their own private jets
And their own private yachts
They're always on vacation
And they never have to work

Chorus:
The rich are different
They don't care about the poor
They're always in their mansions
And they never have to work

Bridge:
They have their own private schools
And their own private hospitals
They're always on vacation
And they never have to work

Chorus:
The rich are different
They don't care about the poor
They're always in their mansions
And they never have to work

Outro:
The rich are different
They don't care about the poor
They're always in their mansions
And they never have to work
